org.corfudb.client

Class CorfuDBClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.corfudb.client.CorfuDBClient
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable

    public class CorfuDBClient
extends Object
implements AutoCloseable
    This class is used by clients to access the CorfuDB infrastructure. It is responsible for constructing client views, and returning interfaces which clients use to access the CorfuDB infrastructure.
    Author:
    Michael Wei

    • Constructor Detail

      • CorfuDBClient

        public CorfuDBClient(String configurationString)
        Constructor. Generates an instance of a CorfuDB client, which manages views of the CorfuDB infrastructure and provides interfaces for clients to access.
        Parameters:
        configurationString - A configuration string which describes how to reach the \ CorfuDB instance. This is usually a http address for a \ configuration master.

    • Method Detail

      • startViewManager

        public void startViewManager()
        Starts the view manager thread. The view manager retrieves the view and manages view changes. This thread will be automatically started when any requests are made, but this method allows the view manager to load the initial view during application load.

      • retrieveView

        public static CorfuDBView retrieveView(String configString)
                                throws IOException
        Retrieves the CorfuDBView from a configuration string. The view manager uses this method to fetch the most recent view.
        Throws:
        IOException

      • invalidateViewAndWait

        public void invalidateViewAndWait()
        Invalidate the current view and wait for a new view.

      • waitForViewReady

        public void waitForViewReady()
        Synchronously block until a valid view is installed.

      • getView

        public CorfuDBView getView(UUID logID)
                    throws RemoteException
        Get the view for a remote log.
        Parameters:
        logID - The UUID of the remote log to retrieve the view for.
        Returns:
        A CorfuDBView, if the remote log can be retrieved, or null, if the UUID cannot be resolved.
        Throws:
        RemoteException

      • getView

        public CorfuDBView getView()
        Get the current view. This method optimisically acquires the current view.

      • close

        public void close()
        Specified by:
        close in interface AutoCloseable
